org.apache.giraph.edge

接口 Edge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index
    E - Edge value
    所有已知子接口:
    MutableEdge<I,E>, ReusableEdge<I,E>
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultEdge, EdgeNoValue, MapMutableEdge

    public interface Edge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A complete edge, the target vertex and the edge value. Can only be one edge with a destination vertex id per edge map.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      I getTargetVertexId()
      Get the target vertex index of this edge
      E getValue()
      Get the edge value of the edge

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTargetVertexId

        I getTargetVertexId()
        Get the target vertex index of this edge
        返回:
        Target vertex index of this edge

      • getValue

        E getValue()
        Get the edge value of the edge
        返回:
        Edge value of this edge
